title: When the hell will Riot fix Rune Page/Mastery Page not changing
body: Just played one of the shittest games of my life just then due to my runes not changing will Riot ever fix this?

replies.body: yeah have to make sure I triple check some times and saving masteries have to make sure they saved
This happens to me all the time; I have to select rune and mastery pages twice even up to 3 times on occasion before it will stay on the page I want to actually use.

Hey, just be glad you can even access your runes and masteries and change them. Ive spent the last 2 weeks (13 or so days) were my client just crashes whenever i click on summoner profiles. So far riot has no clue about it cause its such a rare issue, only Some guy from EUW and I are experiencing it, and it has 100% occurrence rate for me.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Toph,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y97nGFWj,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-02-08T21:50:51.818+0000)
>
> Repairing the client didn't fix it?

nup, and i would have lost all my itemsets too when i did if i hadnt of found the associated files for them and saved them.
When they finally decide to integrate the game client with the lobby to reduce load times and to make the game work better.

after they add a way to customise your champion list
give you the ability to drag rune/mastery pages to reorder them rather then having to delete and remake them in the order you want and
give you a skins tab to see all the skins you have in a gallery type section.
